Member Function Documentation

def Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::Authentication::request (   self,
  method,
  request_uri,
  headers,
  content 
) 
Modify the request headers to add the appropriate
Authorization header. Over-rise this in sub-classes.

Reimplemented in Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::BasicAuthentication, Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::HmacDigestAuthentication, Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::WsseAuthentication, and Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::GoogleLoginAuthentication.

Definition at line 471 of file __init__.py.

def Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::Authentication::response (   self,
  response,
  content 
) 
Gives us a chance to update with new nonces
or such returned from the last authorized response.
Over-rise this in sub-classes if necessary.

Return TRUE is the request is to be retried, for
example Digest may return stale=true.

Reimplemented in Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::DigestAuthentication, and Plurk::oauth2::httplib2::HmacDigestAuthentication.
